content:
TASK: Craft an item of type: jungle_planks
inventory=[{"type": "acacia_wood", "quantity": 28, "index": 13}, {"type": "stripped_jungle_log", "quantity": 1, "index": 17}, {"type": "repeating_command_block", "quantity": 41, "index": 26}, {"type": "oak_sign", "quantity": 4, "index": 35}, {"type": "warped_stem", "quantity": 9, "index": 42}]
thought: To craft a jungle_planks, I need to move a stripped_jungle_log to the crafting table. There is one stripped_jungle_log in slot 17, so I will move it to slot 1.
act: move from slot 17 to slot 1 with quantity 1

TASK: Craft an item of type: jungle_planks
inventory=[{"type": "jungle_planks", "quantity": 4, "index": 0}, {"type": "stripped_jungle_log", "quantity": 1, "index": 1}, {"type": "acacia_wood", "quantity": 28, "index": 13}, {"type": "repeating_command_block", "quantity": 41, "index": 26}, {"type": "oak_sign", "quantity": 4, "index": 35}, {"type": "warped_stem", "quantity": 9, "index": 42}]
thought: I have successfully crafted the jungle_planks, so I will move them to an empty slot in the inventory (eg., slot 11).
act: move from slot 0 to slot 11 with quantity 4
